publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2692.1 George Foulkes: Straiton Park and Ride—As an amendment to motion (S3M-2692) in the name of Mike Pringle, leave out from "welcomes the fact" to "park-and-ride facility" and insert "recognises the hard work that went into commissioning this scheme by the council’s previous Labour administration; considers that the Liberal Democrat/SNP administration is quick to claim credit for things it has not done and avoid blame for things it is responsible for; welcomes the fact that the new facility will significantly reduce the volume of traffic using Edinburgh city centre, easing parking and congestion problems as well as reducing environmentally damaging vehicular emissions; notes that the 600 space complex is the second park-and-ride facility planned by the previous Labour administration". Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S3M-2692.1 Straiton Park and Ride (lodged on 29 October 2008) Claire Baker*, Andy Kerr*, David Whitton*, Jackie Baillie*, Mary Mulligan*, Sarah Boyack*

S3M-2692.1 George Foulkes: Straiton Park and Ride—As an amendment to motion (S3M-2692) in the name of Mike Pringle, leave out from "welcomes the fact" to "park-and-ride facility" and insert "recognises the hard work that went into commissioning this scheme by the council’s previous Labour administration; considers that the Liberal Democrat/SNP administration is quick to claim credit for things it has not done and avoid blame for things it is responsible for; welcomes the fact that the new facility will significantly reduce the volume of traffic using Edinburgh city centre, easing parking and congestion problems as well as reducing environmentally damaging vehicular emissions; notes that the 600 space complex is the second park-and-ride facility planned by the previous Labour administration". Supported by: Claire Baker, Andy Kerr, David Whitton, Jackie Baillie, Mary Mulligan, Sarah Boyack Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
